Нашата История: LLC <<ELECTROMASH SERVICE>> provides a range of services:
about_text1:
* Installation and complete overhauls of high-voltage transformers ranging from 35 kV to 500 kV
* Construction of power distribution networks with voltage levels from 0.4 kV up to 500 kV
* Heavy lifting and rigging services, including the transportation of oversized and heavy industrial equipment
* Transformer oil treatment, including degassing and filtration to ensure optimal performance
* Vacuum drying and filling of transformers to eliminate moisture and improve insulation reliability
* Regeneration of transformer oil to restore its original properties and extend service life
about_text2: Founded in 1998, the company began its activities with the repair of power transformers. Over the years, we have expanded our expertise to offer a full range of services for the energy sector.
about_text3: Our team of highly qualified specialists ensures the completion of every project with high quality and in compliance with international standards and requirements.
